attributes.action: Create additional 'COVID Fightback' Bank Holiday during 2021
attributes.additional_details: People across the country have had to sacrifice many liberties during 2020. Holidays have been cancelled at last minute, loved ones not seen and frontline workers in particular have had to work even harder than they already do. Providing these additional holidays will also provide a welcome boost to the hospitality sector so savagely impacted by the pandemic.
attributes.background: Create 2 additional (Friday-Monday) Bank Holidays during summer 2021. Should the country be subject to Tier 4 restrictions or equivalent at the time of the planned holidays these should be carried forward into the following year

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions which call for similar actions: 

Creation of a temporary bank holiday: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564363 

Create extra bank holidays to make up for those that took place under COVID: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564471 

Create UK Bank Holidays on 25th and 28th June 2021 in lieu of Christmas 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564183

Christmas in July - 2 extra days off on Friday 23rd and Monday 26th July 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564171

Make 26th & 27th July 2021 a one off Double Bank Holiday - Christmas in July: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561169
